job_tasks.phrase: You will be someone who loves to code and build working systems.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to core software engineering activities of coding and building functional systems.

job_tasks.phrase: You will have experience with the software development life cycle, from ideation through implementation, to testing and release.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end process of software creation and delivery, a fundamental software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: You will join a group of more than 40 Engineers in the R&D department and will have the opportunity to collaborate with multiple research teams across diverse areas
job_tasks.justification: This highlights teamwork and the need for collaboration across different teams within the R&D department.

job_tasks.phrase: If you know and love LLMs, or have experience fine tuning LLMs with additional modalities - then we would love to talk to you.
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions experience with Large Language Models (LLMs) and the specific task of fine-tuning them with additional data types, which is a core GenAI specialization.

job_tasks.phrase: Our NLP team is working on creating a virtual director that will automatically generate the best video and best avatar performance based on the context of a user script.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of an AI model (virtual director) for generating content (video/avatar performance), a key task in GenAI model development.

job_tasks.phrase: The team is focused on extracting cues from a large pool of proprietary video and audio data in order to train a virtual director.
job_tasks.justification: This focuses on data extraction and preparation from various sources for the purpose of model training, a core data engineering task for ML.

job_tasks.phrase: In this position, you'll join the team to help train LLMs for text or multi-modal tasks that will help us create human-like avatars and effective powerful videos.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states training LLMs for multimodal tasks, which is a central activity in GenAI model development and specialization.

job_tasks.phrase: You will also help us create high quality, production ready code
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the need to produce code that meets production standards, a key software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: and take ownership of production pipelines.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates responsibility for managing and maintaining the systems that deploy and run models in production, aligning with MLOps principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Assist in finding and collecting appropriate data for the tasks.
job_tasks.justification: Data acquisition and collection are fundamental data engineering tasks required for training and evaluating ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: Make sure we have correct pipelines in place to ingest data from existing processed data, text, voice and video and adjust granularity.
job_tasks.justification: This focuses on building and managing data ingestion pipelines, a crucial aspect of data engineering for ML workflows.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyse and pre-process data if necessary.
job_tasks.justification: Data analysis and preprocessing are key steps in preparing raw data for use in ML models, falling under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Help define and run experimentation to facilitate predicting emotion signals from different architecture choices of the adapted LLM.
job_tasks.justification: This involves experimental design, model adaptation, and prediction, all central to the research and development of ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: Take hypotheses, ideas or papers and create implementations of solutions on the back of these
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of translating research or conceptual ideas into functional software implementations.

job_tasks.phrase: Run experiments on the back of the created implementations that evaluate and verify hypotheses
job_tasks.justification: Conducting experiments to validate hypotheses is a core research and model development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to a high-quality codebase, develop tests where necessary, and participate in code reviews.
job_tasks.justification: These are standard software engineering practices focused on code quality, maintainability, and reliability.

job_tasks.phrase: Help a team of research engineers, scientists and linguists to write clean and efficient code, and define best practices
job_tasks.justification: This involves assisting and guiding a team, and defining shared best practices, which are collaborative and communicative activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Developing production quality software, our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes building production-grade software and adopting a full-stack approach, indicative of robust software engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: passion for working on cutting edge problems
soft_skills.justification: This implies a drive to engage with and learn about new, advanced topics and technologies.

soft_skills.phrase: You are used to working in a fast-paced start-up environment.
soft_skills.justification: Working in a startup environment requires adaptability to changing priorities, rapid development cycles, and evolving requirements.

soft_skills.phrase: opportunity to collaborate with multiple research teams
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions the need to collaborate with various research teams, highlighting teamwork and inter-team communication.
This is a direct statement of taking responsibility for a critical part of the system, indicating ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: Help a team of research engineers, scientists and linguists to write clean and efficient code, and define best practices
soft_skills.justification: This involves assisting and guiding a team, and defining shared best practices, which are collaborative and communicative activities.

soft_skills.phrase: our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world.
soft_skills.justification: The ability to 'deliver direct to product' and 'impact the world' suggests taking initiative and ownership for the final outcome and its real-world effect.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement describes a role that requires a strong foundation in software development (e.g., building working systems, software development life cycle, production-ready code, full-stack development) which falls under Macro-Category A. Simultaneously, it demands deep engagement with Generative AI, specifically LLMs and multimodal tasks for text-to-video generation, including fine-tuning, data engineering, and experimentation, which falls under Macro-Category B (GenAI Specialization). The balance between these two macro-categories, with a clear focus on GenAI technologies and the 'Research Engineer' title, aligns with the definition of a Core GenAI Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is exceptionally clear and detailed, explicitly outlining both core software engineering responsibilities and specific Generative AI tasks. The language used directly maps to the categories in the coding book, leaving little room for ambiguity in classification and profile assignment.
